vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
Delta.tokens_buy.tokens_buy (local variable @ patch_0.sol#19) shadows:
	- Delta.tokens_buy (function @ patch_0.sol#15-39)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Delta.c should be constant (patch_0.sol#4)
Delta.owner should be constant (patch_0.sol#5)
Delta.owner2 should be constant (patch_0.sol#6)

solc-version
